name: Survival planet (2017)
description:
The game takes place in the distant future, when mankind has mastered the technology that makes possible to travel beyond our solar system and colonize other planets. During one of the expeditions your spaceship crashes and you find yourself on a lost planet. A unique, sometimes frightening world will be opened for you. There you have only one option – survive at any cost and return to your home planet.

Game features:
● Exciting story with intriguing plot twists
● Carefully designed game world
● Intense tactical turn-based battles
● A few dozen of completely different opponents
● More than 180 items and interesting system of their creation
● More than 50 buildings in your camp
● Atmospheric soundtrack from North Hive

It's not a simple survival game, it's a comletely new mobile game expirience. It's an exciting sci-fi story with horror elements that implemented via text-based RPG with crafting system and time management. It's a philosophical thriller.
